idea: An 'IQ Challenge' quiz web app that serves three purposes: 1) Help people assess their knowledge about Microsoft Fabric, 2) Demonstrate Azure and Microsoft Fabric technologies, 3) Serve as a booth animation during Microsoft Ignite event. Based on Fabric Flashcards, with Kahoot-inspired UX and 'orange spooky wizards' visual theme. Game includes waiting screen, registration, timed quiz gameplay with difficulty levels, and results/leaderboard. Features real-time telemetry capture sent to Microsoft Fabric for analysis.

project.name: Microsoft Fabric IQ Challenge
project.audience: Microsoft Ignite attendees and Microsoft Fabric learners
project.summary: A time-bombed quiz game with multiple difficulty levels where players answer Microsoft Fabric questions to build streaks, gain time bonuses, and compete on leaderboards. Features real-time telemetry and spooky wizard theming.
constraints: Game must be playable with touch, mouse and keyboard only (ZCBM for answer choices)
Analytics required: Game started, Game ended, question answered, sessionId, userId
Real-time telemetry capture to Microsoft Fabric

stack.name: Hosting
stack.details: Azure Static Web Apps (frontend) + Azure App Service Container (backend)
